sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"疾病"之意。
means: illness ： 不具体指，而是泛指一切疾病，强调生病的时间或状语，语体较sickness正式一些。
sickness ： 较口语化，可与illness换用，但还可表示"恶心"。
disease ： 指具体的疾病，且通常较严重，发病时间也较长。
complaint ： 现代英语中，既可指症状，也可指疾病。

word_mean: 疾病：身体任何部分、器官和(或)系统的结构或功能的偏离正常或停止，表现为颇具特征性的症状及体征，病原、病理及预后有些已被阐明

sentence.Network_en: The conditions are ripe for the spread of disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种疾病传播的条件已经成熟。

sentence.Network_en: The disease wiped out 40 million rabbits at a stroke.
sentence.Network_cn: 该疾病一下子就使4,000万只兔子丧命。

sentence.Network_en: Smoking places you at serious risk of cardiovascular and respiratory disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 吸烟会大大增加罹患心血管和呼吸道疾病的风险。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 疾病负担（burden of disease）是疾病（disease）、伤残（disability）和过早死亡（premature death）对整个社会经济及健康的压力 …
初中英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... discussion n. 讨论，辩论 disease n. 病，疾病 dish n. 盘，碟；盘装菜；盘形物.
Recent research has cast new light on the causes of the disease.最新研究使人们进一步了解了这种疾病的起因.
求大专英语B级单词表_百度知道 ... discussion n.讨论；议论 disease n.病，疾病；病害 disorderly a.混乱的.

list.abs: 皮_百度百科 ... （13）皮肤[ Skin] （14）皮肤病（skin disease）[ Dermatosis；Skin disease] （15）皮革[ Leather；hide].
求常见疾病的英文词汇_百度知道 ... wart 疣心脏病 heart disease 糖尿病 sugar diabetes.
什么叫ID？_百度知道 ... Industrial Design 工业设计; Infectious Disease 传染病; Infective Dose 感染剂量.
disease,illness,sickness的区别... ... contagious diseases 传染病 English disease 气管炎 heart disease 心脏病.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'lack of ease; inconvenience'): from Old French desaise 'lack of ease', from des- (expressing reversal) + aise 'ease'

entry.def: A disease is an illness which affects people, animals, or plants, for example one which is caused by bacteria or infection.

example.ex: ...the rapid spread of disease in the area.
example.tran: 疾病在这一区域的迅速蔓延
诸如心脏病之类的疾病

entry.tran: （尤指社会某一群体的）弊病，积习，恶习
entry.def: You can refer to a bad attitude or habit, usually one that a group of people have, as a disease.

example.ex: ...the wretched disease of racism eating away at the core of our society.
example.tran: 侵蚀着我们社会核心的种族主义恶疾

means.word_mean: 1. an impairment of health or a condition of abnormal functioning

Sentence.sentence: The team conducted a computer-based analysis to determine the impact a 3-g-per-day reduction in salt intake on rates of heart disease and death.
They also calculated the cost savings emerging from the amount of disease that would be avoided because of lower blood pressure
Cheating can spread like a disease.
Those factors are more than enough to make up for the squalor (肮脏), disease and spectacular poverty that those same migrants must often at first endure when they become urban dwellers.
Hospital workers in at least one case deserted their workplace in panic, thus halting the administering of potentially unclean disease spreading injections, but Ebola has not disappeared.
How do people get infected with the disease according to the speaker

sentences.en: Disease is usually caused by germs.
sentences.cn: 疾病通常是由病菌引起的。

jushi.english: The business of doctors is to prevent and cure disease.
jushi.chinese: 医生的职责是防病治病。

jushi.english: Disease is usually caused by germs.
jushi.chinese: 疾病通常是由病菌引起的。

jushi.english: The doctor examined him but could find no sign of heart disease.
jushi.chinese: 医生给他做了检查,没有发现有心脏病的症状。
